alert.note: Alert for Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:10PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Norfolk, west central Plymouth, northwestern Bristol, Washington, northern Newport, Kent, southeastern Providence and Bristol Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 109 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Warwick, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Heavy rain may cause minor flooding. Locations impacted include... Providence, Warwick, Cranston, Pawtucket, Taunton, East Providence, Coventry, Cumberland, North Providence, South Kingstown, West Warwick, Johnston, North Attleborough, Bridgewater, North Kingstown, Bristol, Attleboro, Walpole, Mansfield and Easton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 PM EDT for Rhode Island.

area.areaDesc: Bristol; Eastern Kent; Newport; Northwest Providence; Southeast Providence; Washington; Western Kent
